title: stuffers
extract: Definition of stuffer. 1 : one that stuffs. 2 : an enclosure (such as a leaflet) inserted in an envelope in addition to a bill, statement, or notice. 3 : a series of extra threads or yarn running lengthwise in a fabric to add weight and bulk and to form a backing especially for carpets.
extract_html: Definition of stuffer. 1 : one that stuffs. 2 : an enclosure (such as a leaflet) inserted in an envelope in addition to a bill, statement, or notice. 3 : a series of extra threads or yarn running lengthwise in a fabric to add weight and bulk and to form a backing especially for carpets.
